hero.title: Mathematics for Life Sciences
hero.subtitle: Science-based data science and AI consulting for agriculture, ecology, and environmental research

service1.title: Predictive Modeling & Workflows
service1.description: Advanced statistical models and machine learning pipelines for investigating patterns and predicting outcomes in living systems. From investigation with advanced biostatistics to predictions with machine learning, we develop computational workflows that transform complex ecological and agricultural data into science-based decision making processes.
service1.keywords: Machine learning, dose-response modeling, time series analysis, neural networks

service2.title: Interactive Scientific Applications
service2.description: Custom web applications that transform complex analyses into accessible tools for researchers, farmers, and decision-makers. We build interactive dashboards and interfaces using modern frameworks like Marimo and Observable, making sophisticated models usable in real-world contexts.
service2.keywords: Web applications, dashboards, data visualization, scientific computing

service3.title: Statistical Automation
service3.description: Transform repetitive analytical tasks into automated workflows. Enter your data and receive comprehensive statistical analyses, publication-ready visualizations, and model outputs. We specialize in automating physical models and statistical procedures for systematic reporting and quality control in research and operational contexts.
service3.keywords: Automation, reproducible research, statistical computing, workflow optimization

home.reachOut: If you want to get in touch with me about something or just to say hi, reach out on social media or send me an email.
